website_summaries.verdict: This gigantic 150-quart cooler is the MVP for large parties and events.
pros: Holds a whopping 223 cans and features a antimicrobial liner to resist bacteria
Keeps items cold for up to 6 days in temperatures up to 90 °F
Exterior wears a UV sun protection coating to prevent yellowing, an stainless steel hardware won’t rust
cons: Some users have reported a poor fit between the lid and the base

customer_reviews.title: Not item as pictures
customer_reviews.text: Not the product in the picture. No dividers no shelf and no stainless hands as in picture. Just some crappy little wire holding the land. Amazon should really start sanding the items that is in the picture. Makes me not wanna order anything from Amazon again
customer_reviews.author: firemanV

customer_reviews.title: Kept ice great on 4 day camping trip in August
customer_reviews.text: Cooler was delivered in 2 days as promised and is a great product. My family and I go camping quite a bit and this cooler helped keep our food organized and separated. We used the small tray to store our fragile food like eggs and snacks the kids would frequently open the cooler for (so they wouldn’t be digging around looking for them). We camped in August in Arkansas for 4 days and the cooler kept ice the entire time. On the third day, we added a small fresh bag of ice over the milk and the meat we hadn’t cooked yet, but it was mainly as a precaution to keep it extra cold in that section of the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Warren

customer_reviews.title: Best coolers ever
customer_reviews.text: Love these coolers! I bought 3 so far. Stainless hinges and lid cable, screw in drain, holds ice for days on end. I process hundreds of chickens (and turkeys) a year, and brine my birds in these coolers for 5 days (sometimes in the heat of summer) in salted ice. By the 5th day i still have ice floating as i pull birds out to pack. I had one with shipping damage that Amazon replaced in 2 days. Better than settling for whatever stores happen to have in stock. Well worth the money, i wait for the sales paying $125 with no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photo and description
customer_reviews.text: Update: My rating went from 3 stars to 1 star because the cooler doesn’t even keep ice for 24 hours. In 12 hours the ice in the cooler is 50% water. Original review: Good cooler. Misleading photo of metal piston to hold lid open and not hyper extend the lid hinges. It’s actually a thin piece of wire with two screws. And the “stainless steel lid strap” as listed in the description does not exist (or was missing from our package).
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping things cold!
customer_reviews.text: Folks aren’t lying when they say this thing is huge! We had what I thought was the biggest one they carried until I saw this one. It keeps ice cold for days and is perfect for camping If you plan on leaving it in one space for a while. We use it for drinks and extra food outside our travel trailer fridge. The dividers are a nice convenience and help a lot from digging through ice to find the right thing. I’m a little weary of the handles as they are plastic and it seems like quite a bit of stress on the handles when full but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Familee

customer_reviews.title: Huge Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Huge cooler, almost too big, we fit huge lake trout in this, will probly try and find a smaller one. Definitely a good cooler, keeps ice very well. I bought this because I wanted something to put large fish in on ice throughout the fishing day, I needed ice to stay for 7 hours not 7 days, but this holds the cold very well I bet you could get 5 days out of it, with the proper packing. works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a huge ice chest that is good quality, fair priced and will keep things fairly cool this is the one for you. This ice chest is not the best and will probably not hold ice as well as others but its a great ice chest for the money. Built fairly sturdy with better than average hinges, sit or stand on the lid with no problems. The handles are fairly nice but I wouldn't trust them if it was full of ice or drinks. Most people probably wont be able to pick up a 150 qt ice chest full of drinks and ice anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Willis Drumond

customer_reviews.title: Cold
customer_reviews.text: you want a cooler to keep things cold and/or frozen? this is it!! we moved from CT to FL and used this cooler to move everything from our freezers -- not only did it fit everything, but most was still frozen when we got here 2 days later! it is long, so you do need to be aware that this is a very large cooler. Great buy tho!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Gilkey

customer_reviews.title: It does keep ice well
customer_reviews.text: The size was perfect for our week long family camping trips. The dividers and dry storage tray really made keeping track of a lot of items much easier. We only used chip ice, and in Florida that translated to three days between ice refills. That's better than any cooler I've tried before. My wife enjoyed camp cooking without the hassle of digging all over to find items. My boys didn't break the hinges. The cooler seals right and sure did keep food cold even when the ice was mostly cold water after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: ROB

customer_reviews.title: A good cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for car camping where there are occasional black bears, so cooler has to sit in the bed of the truck. I use block ice from the grocery store to line the bottom of the cooler (it holds five 10 pound blocks) with the food sitting on top of the ice. After 7 days there is still ice, albeit the blocks are a lot smaller. Bag ice WILL NOT last that long in my experience. It did survive one bear attack with just deep bite marks in the lid. Good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps food cold
customer_reviews.text: Still had plenty of ice after a week boating on the coast and it sits in direct sun all day long. Very glad I purchased. I do wish they kept the spring lid holder though instead of the cable. This is my second of this same model and both are in service the older one has the spring. I added a spring holder and the divots are there where the screws go for it so it was easy to add on.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great Cooler at a good price! It did what it needed to do which was fit a 1/4 of a cow that I purchased and needed to transport. :) I can't speak to longevity of keeping things cool, but this kept my meat frozen for the 6-12 hours it was sitting in there without any issues or extra ice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: OK, but NOT as good as the costly roto-molded coolers.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cooler. Reviews said it kept ice cold for as long as the newly designed (and much more expensive) roto-molded coolers which have better insulation. Not so. This is a good cooler for the price, but it definitely does not keep ice (or contents) cold for as long as the more expensive roto-molded coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Old Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Inside hinge not as pictured and missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Inside hinge not as pictured and missing pieces Inside hinge was a wire wrapped around two screws. Missing dividers and spout.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetguy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Drinks Cooler Longer!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler! Had a party for on Labor Day with 40+ people in oppressive heat and humidity and had many other coolers as well full of drinks. This one is the only one that kept ice cubed longer and drinks ice cold. Ice was still in it's cube form two days later with the continuing heat, while the others coolers were just cool water. This cooler holds a lot of drinks and the hinges are stainless steel which is why I bought this one over the others with the plastic hinges. Would definitely recommend and I plan to buy another for future parties.
customer_reviews.author: Ninjakitty

customer_reviews.title: Not the heavy duty one that is shown...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 100QT version of this. Like other people are saying, this is not the heavy duty metal arm divider version that is shown in many of the photos. With that said, I paid $50 for this on Amazon sale and it is meant to stay in my basement for holiday overflow. For my purposes of defrosting turkeys, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Kawahara

customer_reviews.title: Damaged cooler
customer_reviews.text: The item is fine. The lid was damaged when i opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S Moore

customer_reviews.title: not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cooler as a replacement for our 30 year old one. We loved the pictured interior accessories. THE COOLER DOES NOT COME WITH ACCESSORIES. It is overpriced for just a shell. I was willing to pay the extra because I wanted those features. Amazon does not stand behind this product. We contacted customer service and although they sympathized that they can see how we thought it would have the accessories, there's nothing they can do. We will be returning because we can buy elsewhere for much less.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I've used this cooler for several camping trips over the summer. The compartment separators and tray are really convenient for keep food and drinks separated and keeping certain things off the ice but still cold. It hold Ice fairly well with regular opening, about 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal good.
customer_reviews.text: Received the cooler and realized the lid doesn't seal. Returned and got a replacement and same thing. You can see an obvious gap between the lid and the base. I put a half bag of ice in 68 degree weather and it was half melted in one day. I'm considering running a bead of silicone around the lid to see if that will seal better. I'll update the review when I get some real world use out of this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT WAS ORDERED 3 TIMES
customer_reviews.text: Either the manufacture has discontinued the product pictured or Amazon has their stuff crossed up. We returned each one and even called customer service. We wanted the item pictured but never could get what we paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Varn Harper

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had other extreme coolers that put up with me beating the tar out of them, this one has been pretty lousy and after only two years it no longer keeps ice for more than a few hours. Both hinges have failed and the other shell is starting to delaminate. I'm not ready to spend Yeti money but I wouldn't buy this cooler again.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the cooler advertised/pictured (is missing all inserts, & arrived damaged)!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Did not receive the cooler advertised!!! The one I purchased at Amazon/Coleman! As pictured: has a black ‘Coleman’ front center logo, 1 tray, 2 separators, & a rigid metal rod, to hold lid open. Instead, we received a broken box, a damaged alternate cooler, with a large info sticker on front left, a white ‘Coleman’ label front center, no trays, no separators, & a flimsy metal lid cord to hold lid open, which it does not do! We’ve used Coleman products for decades. This is sooo bad & disappointing! Now I see many other buyer/reviews had the same issues. Shame on you, Coleman! Will return ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great at keeping ice frozen
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy kept our ice frozen for 3-4 days! Granted, it was stored outside in 50 degree weather but still!!! It fits great in the back of our minivan and held drinks and other refrigerated meals to feed our family of 5 for about 4 days. Super pleased with the purchase that should last us a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor fitting lid spoils this nice looking cooler
customer_reviews.text: Just received this 100 Qt. cooler today. Unfortunately I need to pound with my fist along the front edge of the lid to close it to a sealed & fully closed position. However I then need a wide blade screw driver to pry the lid open again. Poor fitting lid spoils this nice looking cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Baba Yaga

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This holds ice for at least 3 days in the shade while icing down meat after a day of hunting or butchering. This allows us to butcher in the heat and age the meat for a few days rather than having to wait until the late Fall to do it. So afar, no problems and well please with the size.
customer_reviews.author: Lajaw

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge and it keeps ice for several days. I really like the dividers. I think chest is as good and even better than those $300 smaller ice chests.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cooler, it works great and is a nice size! Unfortunately it was more expensive than the larger and smaller ones, I guess it is an off size?
customer_reviews.author: PVD

customer_reviews.title: Lid Doesn't Sit Against Gasket - Big Crack
customer_reviews.text: I didn't catch it in time to return, but the lid doesn't sit tight against the bottom gasket. I also noticed that the back gasket is detaching after only four months, and we've only used the cooler twice, gently both times. I like the size, but there's no point in buying a cooler that doesn't shut and seal reasonably tightly, and ours doesn't seal tightly at all. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler ever !
customer_reviews.text: This beat several other brands as well on a 5 day river trip. excellent cooler !!!!! I would know I have about a dozen coolers. Best cooler ever !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit all of our food
customer_reviews.text: Fits all of our food when we are camping and keeps it cold. Only reason for not full stars is it does not have wheels like my other big cooler. Hard to lift when packed with food, would have been a lot easier with wheels on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Stuckey Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great size cooler
customer_reviews.text: First cooler delivered had a broken handle and I returned it. The replacement cooler is perfect for what I need it for. It does have 2 divider slots but no dividers are sold to match cooler. Drain plug fits standard garden hose.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler - really holds ice
customer_reviews.text: The cooler came undamaged (That was our concern given other reviews) and ready to use. Due to its thick insulation, the inside is not as large as one might think given it's outside dimensions. I would say it is only slightly larger in capacity to our previous 65 quart model that had much thinner insulation. It has performed well in 3 days of extreme heat (115 daytime and 95 overnight) with plenty of ice left. In cooler weather it will easily last the 6 days advertised. For the money, I would highly recommend this cooler and cannot imagine a Yeti doing much better.
customer_reviews.author: Scotto

customer_reviews.title: Would just say this is an OK cooler for a boat and a good cooler for partys at home
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep ice as long as they say. The hinges in the back started coming loose after some use. Would just say this is an OK cooler for a boat and a good cooler for partys at home, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Man

customer_reviews.title: Extreme excellence
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Metal hinge plates. What else do you want? Oh, sturdy plastic dividers. And a tray for cool items? How about a galvanize steel Spicket for connecting a hose to drain your Melted ice. This was a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rotenberry

customer_reviews.title: Stood up to the AZ heat!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing cooler! We just got back from 4 days at Lake Powell in AZ in 100+ degree weather. We put 3 frozen gal of water and they weren't completely defrosted until our last day. A half gallon of milk stayed perfectly cold until we were back home even. Great size, great quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amy ricca

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two to transport frozen meat and frozen home cooked casseroles and refrigerated items over a two day road trip. Everything arrived just fine. :). Nice large handles with grips. Stainless steel hinges. Seals really well. Looking forward to using these for some fishing.
customer_reviews.author: N Beecham

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, good price!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it has dividers and a top tray to easily separate and organize everything.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A Moore

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these and one included separators, a tray and a hose connector for draining. The other didn't have anything in it. Other than that they seem to be good quality. I will be using these to brine turkeys to smoke for the holidays. They will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Brock

customer_reviews.title: Kept ice longer than claimed
customer_reviews.text: Kept food cold and ice lounger then what it claimed. Little melting of ice up to 4th day. By 8th day had to drain some water out.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Z.

customer_reviews.title: Coleman Marine 150 qt Cooler Heritage XP H2O
customer_reviews.text: truly a great cooler from Coleman. fits in the back of my boat just like it was made for it.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsmoke

customer_reviews.title: Solid cooler. Does NOT include divider as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with this cooler. Kept ice for many days and has reasonable capacity for a family of four for a weekend trip. When I purchased it, the description said that it came with one compartment divider, yet it did not. It was not a deal-breaker, but buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: StPauli76

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered this cooler. Just the size we need. May be ordering another one soon
customer_reviews.author: MA-Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Best value in large ice chests!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! It's not a Yeti but does an amazing job for such a low price.
customer_reviews.author: EK3

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: 3 days after buying this the handle broke, piece of crap!!
customer_reviews.author: denise izumi

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: The cooler in the picture is not the one you get the drain cap doesn't tighten up so it leaks water the metal lid support that is in the picture is not there they replaced it with a wire
customer_reviews.author: Captain Mike

customer_reviews.title: Normal cooler.
customer_reviews.text: A normal Coleman cooler. Won't keep anything cold for 6 days. I put 40lbs of ice in this at 5pm one day. By midnight I had lost at least 10lbs - 15lbs of ice without touching it for those hours.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cooler for going Bass fishing in the very hot temperatures of the Venezuelan llanos. i'm pleased with it so far, its been a year since i got it. It handles ice for 4 days without opening too much at 38o C. at shadow. Came with stainless steel hinges and door holder. i'm so pleased with it that i'll be buying my second one as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Luis David Valencia

customer_reviews.title: The good news is that it did keep ice cold for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this cooler to use on our boat. The good news is that it did keep ice cold for several hours. The bad news is that the cooler is poorly made. The plastic drain came out when we opened it to drain the water. The screw holding the latch inside the lid also pulled out. This happened the first time we used it. Luckily we were able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Salafrio

customer_reviews.title: Ammmmmazing
customer_reviews.text: What a great cooler durable, large, kept ice cold for a 6 day camping trip. Amazing I highly recommend this cooler wont be disappointed and best price on them by far.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Bontempo

customer_reviews.title: Huge but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We use it more than the expensive yeti. But beware it is huge! We like it because then we only have to pack one ice chest for any trip we take.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to claim of 6 day cold retention; maybe 2 at best.
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold ice for more than 2 days. Melts some within day 1; rest is gone by dinner next day. Was not in sunlight: located on screened porch with minimal late day sun if at all. Melted faster than design specs indicated and not even very warm weather. NC-VA Coast in April.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Non-sealing lid
customer_reviews.text: Lid did not even remotely seal and would not stay closed as intended by design. Turn the cooler upside down empty and the lid flops open. Never going to stay cold with that type of seal.
customer_reviews.author: Denise harkins

customer_reviews.title: Not a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Not a Yeti, but it holds ice longer than your regular cooler.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong measurements
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler, looked good. However, the measurements listed are not true to size. Had to return item, since it didn’t fit on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii buyer

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed this is not the same cooler listed, I should have trusted the reviews. Does not have the same metal hinge inside, but has a thin wire. Its also missing the dividers shown. Missing the black logo on front as well. Walmart has the same cooler I got for $60!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: NO dividers and different look
customer_reviews.text: Hello there, I can’t seem to contact anyone but my cooler arrived today and it didn’t come with any dividers on top of that the front of it isn’t the same as shown. The pic shown has a black sticker. This doesn’t. Can someone please contact me? The reason I wanted this because of the dividers. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: casey strebe

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Took this cooler camping and I was sooo impressed. Precooked with ice the day prior and put in 2 blocks of ice and 2 bags of chipped ice to keep items cold had most of my ice left after 4 days and in the sun! Great cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Natascha Stolhand

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Went out for the weekend, loaded the cooler with beverages and ice. Forgot to clean and remove the stuff after we where done. Came back next weekend to find ice cold Coca-Cola and a few pieces of ice floating around. Nice for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Chartier

customer_reviews.title: Good for commercial use.
customer_reviews.text: Use these in my business. Like the SS hinges and this size.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Like a second fridge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cooler. Not only can we use it for camping and picnics it will come in handy for harvest season and the overflow that will not fit in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: radio fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for the price-point
customer_reviews.text: Opted for this over a Yeti/Arctic. Read some feedback about the handles being inadequate, so I modified them to be bullet-proof. Great cooler for the price-point. Delivery of the item was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Malone

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely large and loaded it will take two people to move like the S.S hinges
customer_reviews.author: Fishing Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great for fisherman or the outdoorsman...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boyfriend for use on fishing trips. He loves it! Holds ice well.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Used for a 16 day camping trap. Average temps ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for a 16 day camping trap. Average temps were in the mid 80's during the day, but falling to the 20's and night. Put 50lbs of dry ice in it, and it stayed cold and frozen until day 14.
customer_reviews.author: bg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler , especially for the price. We actually bought it for a storage bin on our boat, and if we every need it for a cooler we have it. I know it sounds weird, but it stores our covers for the boat and seats really great, and they last longer than a regular bin. We also have a emergency cooler for longer days.
customer_reviews.author: barbbbb

customer_reviews.title: ... time I have used this cooler it has been wonderful. I have had to use much less ice ...
customer_reviews.text: Every time I have used this cooler it has been wonderful. I have had to use much less ice than I have had to use in other coolers.
customer_reviews.author: ar386

customer_reviews.title: Nice big cooler but not as described
customer_reviews.text: Nice big cooler but not as described. I ordered this cooler over the 120 quart marine because it was described as having a latching lid. In fact it does not have a latching lid! I will be sending this cooler back and purchasing the 120 quart to save $47.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those long trips back from Costco! Perfect size for your trunk or hatch. Cooler works as it should and was received in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Coleman doesn’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Our camper refrigerator never worked. We bought this cooler & it did what we needed it to do. Kept everything cold including butter. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Darlene R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a Saturday wedding at the house. Wednesday we still had cold soda!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Alright cooler
customer_reviews.text: One of the metal hing screws already started to fail on the first trip. Seemed to keep food cold in 100 degree weather for our trip
customer_reviews.author: J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the Dividers or tray that were supposed to come with it.
customer_reviews.author: melody olson

customer_reviews.title: Mini coffin
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. I love how it has dividers. Def game changer
customer_reviews.author: Misael Reyes II

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Product was nice but it arrived late so I wasn't able to use it
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Big mutha cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a big cooler. Really big. Probably should have gotten the 120 or 100qt but the 150 works. Bought for a week vacation on an island where we had to keep a lot of food in it for the week. It's definitely better than other coolers but I would t rely on ice lasting for 6 days as advertised. With food and beverages ice lasted maybe 2 days. I really do like the dividers and the tray. Those help a lot. Just wish ice lasted longer. Btw, due to size and weight it's difficult to fit into the back seat of a 4dr Jeep. It's huge and barely fits thru the door opening.
customer_reviews.author: TheHoppyCarpenter

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for your Bluck
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NOT HAD A CHANCE TO USE THEM YET. THE LOOK MORE THAN GOOD ENOUGH TO DO THE JOB.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cronkhite, Retired U.S. Navy, Morris, New York

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with the same accessories as in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model because I have seen that it comes with the tray and divider. Neither came with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dirty with what looked like coffee stains and a homemade box
customer_reviews.author: Holly Knauf

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I love the ice chest but it had a big dent in the lid. I shop a lot with amazon and don’t think I should pay full price for damaged product
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: This cooler is amazing. Keeps ice for days and fits amazing on ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is amazing. Keeps ice for days and fits amazing on my swim platform. Doubles as a step and seat with added cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Best coleman yet
customer_reviews.text: I've owned plenty of coleman coolers this one is by far the best one yet kept ice for 5 days at 85 degrees the steel hinges and holding spring is great. Highly recommend I'll be buying the smaller model to go with this one
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: LARGE cooler
customer_reviews.text: VERY large. Holds ice for days. Works perfectly for the purpose I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Chipmunk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept our beers cold over a long weekend!! Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: big cooler looks good had a small dent in lid but I pushed it out
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: seams well crafted, i can fill it up and top it off with ice and last all weekend..
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: ice cold foods 4-5 days later.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cooler we've ever had. Its fantastic. You do have to add more ice during your trip, but it does keep your foods cold like a refrigerator for 4-5 day. Perfect for our camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: ceharmony

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything super cold for several days
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything super cold for several days. Took it on a 5 day camping trip and still cold on the day we left!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hemminger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: large, held our food frozen when we defrosted a freezer
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke off the first time we used it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: It works grate. Went camping for a week had ...
customer_reviews.text: It works grate. Went camping for a week had my kids opening the cooler many time through the day and it still held ice for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: jesus

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: We use it for our Clemson tailgates. We have ice until we dump it out the next day! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Iannelli

customer_reviews.title: 5 Day Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice to have a locking cooler, but top closes tight. Bought off season, excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: bushwackeratv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: This cooler really does what it promises - keeps items cold for days! Highly recommend for anyone requiring auxiliary cold storage, planning along camping trip, etc.
customer_reviews.author: wurdgirl

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity is nice, no locks for lid is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold ice for 3 days in 90 degree temperature. Large capacity is nice, no locks for lid is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Fine cooler. Great hinges and handles on it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with some dents in it. Fine cooler. Great hinges and handles on it. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work on Monday
customer_reviews.text: Arrived next day (Sunday) as promised. Perfect for work on Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne K.

customer_reviews.title: Really great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Left it in tent trailer for 2 days while we went backpacking then used it another 2 days without replacing the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Cooler to own!
customer_reviews.text: Hold ice for 6 days. A good cooler to have for long trip.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler for a camping trip after reading the reviews and it was wonderful! We had 4 teens who opened and closed it all day and we only put ice in it one time in 4 days! It was a very smart purchase and I'm sure I will use it for years to come! Only one down fall I wish I had gotten the one with the wheels!
customer_reviews.author: wiggins

product_meta.title: Coleman Marine Cooler
feature_bullets: Designed for boaters and fishers, with UVGuard sun protection to prevent yellowing
